name: FAR Scheduler
description: A multi-week scheduling widget with selectable time slots.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start date of the scheduler (e.g., 2025-10-05).

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end date of the scheduler (e.g., 2025-10-26).

greyOut.title: Grey Out Slots
greyOut.description: Comma-separated list of slots to grey out (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM).
